author: hsiaowei
content:
**[CL-spec-notification]** Sorry for another delay of CL spec release. We will try to include an Electra bugfix (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3868, thanks to <@425572898787426305> <@199561711278227457> and co) to the incoming release. Hope to get it merged before ACDC.

Therefore, it might be a Friday release.

author: parithosh
